variants: We've tried for a long time to win OTHER_FIRST to the Lord, but OTHER_SUBJECT doesn't want anything to do with God.
I doubt OTHER_SUBJECT will ever come to the light. OTHER_SUBJECT loves darkness too much.
I see OTHER_OBJECT around town sometimes, but OTHER_SUBJECT tries to avoid me.
The more I tell OTHER_OBJECT about who God is, the less interested OTHER_SUBJECT seems.
OTHER_FIRST doesn't push me away when I talk about Jesus, but I think OTHER_SUBJECT's just trying to be polite.
OTHER_SUBJECT will let me tell OTHER_OBJECT about God, but sometimes I think OTHER_SUBJECT is just playing along.
Sometimes I think OTHER_SUBJECT is just pretending to be a Christian.
OTHER_FIRST seems to really think that OTHER_SUBJECT is a Christian, but... I'm not sure OTHER_POSSESS heart is right with God.
